This month only, get double disk, double bandwidth AND double RAM for life! New orders only please.

Transfer Special: Transfer from a competitor by the end of this month and receive a $50.00 service credit.​


Host in our our New York Green datacenter- offering on-site solar power generation, Cold Containment Pods, and smart aisle cooling technology to make for the most energy efficient datacenter of its size anywhere!



TurnKey VPS offers Xen powered Virtual Server technology backed by our own wholly owned New York Green Datacenter, equipment, and U.S. based support team.

All VPS's include the following:

  • Xen - No Over Selling, All Guaranteed resources!
  • Linux or Windows (and custom OS's such as Vmware, Solaris, and more!)
  • 50+ Pre-ready Linux images to choose from
  • 50+ CD rom ISO CD Discs to install custom operating systems
  • Guaranteed Ram - No burst, no over sold servers, fully allocated ram!
  • Raid-10 ultra-fast disk systems (SSD, SATA 6Gbps, & SAS 15K RPM Technology)
  • Tier-1 National backbone connections via BGP4 Redundant Juniper Powered Core Network
  • TurnKey VPS Administration Panel Access (web based)
  • Automated Reboots
  • Automated OS Reloads
  • KVM/Console Access to all VPS's included free!
  • Licensed Installed VPS Image versions of windows 2008 and 2003 available
  • Bring your own license versions for Windows 2003, 2008, XP and Win 7
  • Control Panels Available: cPanel, Plesk, DirectAdmin, & Webmin
  • 1 IP Address included, up to 32 per VPS available
  • Free SmarerTools Bundle, an $800 Value with Windows VPS Packages
  • 100% network uptime guarantee
  • 24x7 toll-free phone, live chat, and help desk support
  • 30-day money back guarantee
  • NO term contract (month to month)
  • NO Setup fees
  • 3 Months Free for 12 month prepay
  • 1 Month Free for 6 month prepay

Free iPhone APP Included - manage your VPS on the Go. Reboot, Monitor usage, bandwidth, RAM, and more - securely from the palm of your hand any where in the world!
